text: My son has been learning violin and piano here since 5 years ago while my daughter has started to learn violin two years back. The admin staff are very friendly and helpful. Teachers are professional and always ready to provide feedbacks for room of improvements. My children love the lessons as the teachers are very encouraging.
Im over the moon to relive my piano playing days with Fasosola!

The music teacher in fasosola is very friendly, very kind and she does his job very professionally. You can choose what's ever music instruments that you wish to learn. The customer service was outstanding,  they will try to schedule the timing for you that when you are free.

Very proactive and friendly administrative team!

Location is convenient, school environment is comfortable. Fees for 1-to-1 classes are also very reasonable.
My eldest started learning piano with Ms Wong since the age of 5. We absolutely love her way of teaching and guidance...
